name: 晴れし靄かな
description: The goal of this game is very clear. It's about making a lot of money. But to get there, you'll have to use a wide variety of gimmicks, and the most important thing in this game is luck. This game focuses on the player's luck. At a crossroads in life, at a critical decision, we leave every choice to luck. However, it is a unique human ability, and the choices made in the unconscious have power. The basis of the game is high and low and roguelike games. The motif of the picture refers to Hanafuda, and the overall is unified in a Japanese-style atmosphere. We guarantee that this game will be innovative and offer its own humor and entertainment.
